Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The main sequence in all cases begins with RA, VF, AE. This is a clear, consistent structure observed across the event log.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Understanding case variations: Case 2 lacks RMI and VF repetitions, directly proceeding to AD, SC, AC. In contrast, Cases 1 and 3 exhibit an RMI-VF pattern, with repetitions distinctly observable in Case 3.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Considering the observed behavior of RMI and VF, hypothesizing that a loop structure is necessary to capture repetitions of these steps.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Applying the problem's constraints for process tree construction: using SEQUENCE for main flows, XOR for branching, and LOOP for repetitions.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: The designed process tree aligns with all case scenarios: Case 2 fits the direct path (bypassing the loop), Cases 1 and 3 correctly follow the RMI-VF loop structure before proceeding to completion.
